message: I'm going to to with Verona. The light brick allows for some contrast with the rest of the studio and people. Also red brick always just seems to look old after time goes by.
Heh, i don't remember the names. But the first one looked dirty :)
Verona is the light colored, gritty one. The Camden is the one that looks like Bacon. The Genova is the fake looking smoothed edged one.
How are the names going to be put on the bricks?
Leo will chisel 'em in during the shows ;)
